pageContent: Aims: The aims of this study were to: quantify the levels and predictors of physical activity in prostate cancer survivors on androgen-deprivation therapy (ADT); gain some insight into the effect of physical activity on the quality of life of prostate cancer survivors on ADT; and compare the quality of life of prostate cancer survivors on ADT with matched controls.

Prostate cancer: indicators of aggressiveness
